headline: Aon Promotes Lyons to Bermuda CEO of Reinsurance
summary: Aon plc , a leading global professional services firm, today announced that Amanda Lyons had been appointed CEO of Aon Reinsurance Solutions Limited in Bermuda, effective July 1 and subject to...
